${ModID}:AbstractExileCard.NAME: Not Actually a Card
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sigils can only be played via discard.

${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.NAME: Resonance
${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.FLAVOR: It's like a magic boomerang, except it isn't a boomerang, it just boomerangs back to you like a boomerang.

${ModID}:StaffStrike.NAME: Staff Strike
${ModID}:StaffStrike.FLAVOR: The wizard's staff has a knob on the end.

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend.FLAVOR: The most basic of defensive spells.

${ModID}:ForceBolt.NAME: Force Bolt
${ModID}:ForceBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:ForceBolt.FLAVOR: Many people don't like the force spells because you can barely see them. You can definitely see the effects though.

${ModID}:IceDamage.NAME: Cold
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 #yFrostbite for every 2 unblocked damage dealt.
When an enemy with Frostbite attacks they take damage. Frostbite is removed at the end of their turn.

${ModID}:EldritchDamage.NAME: Eldritch
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 #yTemporary #yHP for every 3 unblocked damage dealt.
Temporary HP is lost at the end of battle.

${ModID}:ForceDamage.NAME: Force
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 #yCrushed for every 6 unblocked damage dealt.
Crushed enemies take more damage from attacks. Crushed is removed at the end of their turn.

${ModID}:Miasma.NAME: Miasma
${ModID}:Miasma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:M2! Weak. NL Target deals !M! less damage with attacks this turn.
${ModID}:Miasma.FLAVOR: Every year the new students call it the fart spell and believe they've attained the pinnacle of humor.

${ModID}:FrozenLance.NAME: Frozen Lance
${ModID}:FrozenLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:FrozenLance.FLAVOR: I learned this spell from a stranger on a train.

${ModID}:PhantomFist.NAME: Phantom Fist
${ModID}:PhantomFist.FLAVOR: It's like hitting them with a fist, except the fist is the size of a watermelon and made of steel.

${ModID}:Thunderbolt.NAME: Thunderbolt
${ModID}:Thunderbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the highest HP enemy.
${ModID}:Thunderbolt.FLAVOR: Lightning spells are excellent at penetrating targets to their core, where the soul resides. Weaving in a small amount of necromantic energy makes these spells much more effective.

${ModID}:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
${ModID}:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Activate: You may draw a card and discard a card one time.
${ModID}:Anticipate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Activate: You may draw a card and discard a card !M! times.

${ModID}:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
${ModID}:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.
${ModID}:Barrier.FLAVOR: A great spell for when you need to defend yourself but stay mobile.

${ModID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${ModID}:Blink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard a card. NL Discard a card next turn.
${ModID}:Blink.FLAVOR: Quite often the best defense is simply not being there.

${ModID}:EldritchTentacle.NAME: Eldritch Tentacle
${ModID}:EldritchTentacle.FLAVOR: A pact with primordial beings lets me drain a target's life force to revitalize my own. These beings get a cut of this life force in exchange.

${ModID}:StasisField.NAME: Stasis Field
${ModID}:StasisField.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Crushed and ${ModID}:Frostbite do not wear off for !M! turns.

${ModID}:Decay.NAME: Decay
${ModID}:Decay.DESCRIPTION: Apply Decay equal to the target's ${ModID}:Jinx. NL Decay increases all damage taken.
${ModID}:Decay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Decay equal to the target's ${ModID}:Jinx + 1. NL Decay increases all damage taken.

${ModID}:WailingSigil.NAME: Wailing Sigil
${ModID}:WailingSigil.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies deal !M! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.NAME: Crumbling Sigil
${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies take 50% extra damage from non-Attacks.
${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies take 65% extra damage from non-Attacks.

${ModID}:ColdSigil.NAME: Cold Sigil
${ModID}:ColdSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the lowest HP enemy.
${ModID}:ColdSigil.FLAVOR: Inscribe the appropriate runes into clay, cast an incantation, and spend the mana before battle. During battle it will cost no mana to activate it, although you will need to throw it accurately.

${ModID}:HardSigil.NAME: Hard Sigil
${ModID}:HardSigil.FLAVOR: Sigils take on the properties of their spells to a minor degree. This sigil is particularly hard to break.

${ModID}:JinxedSigil.NAME: Jinxed Sigil
${ModID}:JinxedSigil.FLAVOR: A proper sigil can only be activated by a trigger word spoken by its creator. You wouldn't want to curse yourself with a sigil in your pocket, so take great care to enchant it properly.

${ModID}:BurningSigil.NAME: Burning Sigil
${ModID}:BurningSigil.FLAVOR: There are things I do not understand about Demon Fire, but I know that it somehow burns in a supernatural way unrelated to thermodynamics. This allows me to mix in ice spells without losing effectiveness.

${ModID}:PulsingSigil.NAME: Pulsing Sigil
${ModID}:PulsingSigil.DESCRIPTION: Add a random ${ModID}:Resonant card to hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:HeavySigil.NAME: Heavy Sigil
${ModID}:HeavySigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

${ModID}:Weave.NAME: Weave
${ModID}:Weave.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Apply its damage types to the next Exile Attack card you play.
${ModID}:Weave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 2 cards. NL Apply their damage types to the next Exile Attack card you play.

${ModID}:ClockSigil.NAME: Clock Sigil
${ModID}:ClockSigil.FLAVOR: Slow is such a useful spell.

${ModID}:ConsumeTheWeak.NAME: Consume the Weak
${ModID}:ConsumeTheWeak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each buff you have.

${ModID}:Harmony.NAME: Harmony
${ModID}:Harmony.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block per ${ModID}:Resonance.

${ModID}:SonicAgony.NAME: Sonic Agony
${ModID}:SonicAgony.FLAVOR: Resonant spells are a favorite of mine. You have to keep spending the mana of course, but you don't have to do anything else to keep casting it.

${ModID}:LongNote.NAME: Long Note
${ModID}:LongNote.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes !M! damage at the start of its turns.
${ModID}:LongNote.FLAVOR: This is the song that never ends. It goes on and on my friends.

${ModID}:Beat.NAME: Beat
${ModID}:Beat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:BadVibes.NAME: Bad Vibes
${ModID}:BadVibes.FLAVOR: A personal favorite of mine. If the enemy has a lot of bad luck, everything you cast is more likely to be effective.

${ModID}:Convert.NAME: Convert
${ModID}:Convert.DESCRIPTION: The next non-power non-exhausting Exile card you play becomes ${ModID}:Resonant.

${ModID}:WellPrepared.NAME: Well Prepared
${ModID}:WellPrepared.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:ManaBlood.NAME: Mana Blood
${ModID}:ManaBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and draw a card.
${ModID}:ManaBlood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and draw a card.
${ModID}:ManaBlood.FLAVOR: If you inject the right reagents into your veins, you can become much more powerful. I was called foolish for improving myself this way.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Activate: Once per turn you may spend [E] to draw !M! cards.
${ModID}:Haste.FLAVOR: You don't have to outrun the dragon, you just have to outrun someone else.

${ModID}:ArcaneBeam.NAME: Arcane Beam
${ModID}:ArcaneBeam.FLAVOR: Only a few have mastered this spell. Those who do are revered.

${ModID}:ConsumeSouls.NAME: Consume Souls
${ModID}:ConsumeSouls.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you cause Fatal damage, gain !M! Max HP.
${ModID}:ConsumeSouls.FLAVOR: Oh man, I'm glad no one discovered I could do this. I'd probably be executed instead of exiled.

${ModID}:StoneDaggers.NAME: Stone Daggers
${ModID}:StoneDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the enemy.

${ModID}:Dispel.NAME: Dispel
${ModID}:Dispel.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL of your debuffs. NL Gain !M! Artifact.
${ModID}:Dispel.FLAVOR: It pays to be prepared for one of your spells to misfire.

${ModID}:DrainingStrikes.NAME: Draining Strikes
${ModID}:DrainingStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:Debilitate.NAME: Debilitate
${ModID}:Debilitate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Apply !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Crushed and ${ModID}:Frostbite.

${ModID}:EnchantedDagger.NAME: EnchantedDagger
${ModID}:EnchantedDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gains all damage types of other cards in your hand.

${ModID}:Nocebo.NAME: Nocebo
${ModID}:Nocebo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply *Nocebo !M! times. NL *Nocebo is a debuff that does nothing.

${ModID}:Enfeeble.NAME: Enfeeble
${ModID}:Enfeeble.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:Enfeeble.FLAVOR: Quick and easy to cast. It won't win a fight by itself, but the tactical value is high.

${ModID}:Grease.NAME: Grease
${ModID}:Grease.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:Grease.FLAVOR: Quick and easy to cast. A good setup for a stronger spell.

${ModID}:Vitality.NAME: Vitality
${ModID}:Vitality.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a Status card, Exhaust it and draw a card.

${ModID}:CurseWeapon.NAME: Curse Weapon
${ModID}:CurseWeapon.FLAVOR: This is why spells are superior. A weapon can be damaged, destroyed. The only way to destroy my spells is to destroy me.

${ModID}:WeightedStaff.NAME: Weighted Staff
${ModID}:WeightedStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to the amount of ${ModID}:Jinx on the target.

${ModID}:SickBurn.NAME: Sick Burn
${ModID}:SickBurn.FLAVOR: I got to name this spell. I'm quite proud of it.

${ModID}:SackOfDebris.NAME: Sack Of Debris
${ModID}:SackOfDebris.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.
${ModID}:SackOfDebris.FLAVOR: It's not just the spells you know, it's how you use them. Small sharp metal objects in a bag aren't particularly deadly. Neither is a propulsion spell. But if you combine them...

${ModID}:Study.NAME: Study
${ModID}:Study.DESCRIPTION: !M! turns from now, choose 1 of !${ModID}:M2! rare cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 that turn.
${ModID}:Study.FLAVOR: I didn't get to be a badass by sitting around on the couch all day.

${ModID}:TargetWeakness.NAME: Target Weakness
${ModID}:TargetWeakness.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, enemy takes 50% more damage from Attacks if they are Weakened.
${ModID}:TargetWeakness.FLAVOR: The Ironclads, before they were destroyed, trained themselves to quickly analyze opponents for weaknesses. I once hired an old veteran to teach me how to analyze my foes. It significantly improved my tactics.

${ModID}:Cannon.NAME: Cannon
${ModID}:Cannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Dazed into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Cannon.FLAVOR: Turning your staff into a cannon sounds awesome. NL But the kickback is a bitch.

${ModID}:DeepFreeze.NAME: Deep Freeze
${ModID}:DeepFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${ModID}:Push.NAME: Push
${ModID}:Push.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

${ModID}:Dualcast.NAME: Dual Cast
${ModID}:Dualcast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${ModID}:IceIcon] damage. NL Deal !D! [${ModID}:ForceIcon] damage. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:SpinningSigil.NAME: Spinning Sigil
${ModID}:SpinningSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the highest hp enemy. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:ManaBurst.NAME: Mana Burst
${ModID}:ManaBurst.DESCRIPTION: The first time you discard a ${ModID}:Sigil each turn, gain [E] and draw a card.
${ModID}:ManaBurst.FLAVOR: If you add more mana than necessary into the crafting process, you can get some back when you activate it.

${ModID}:LightningBlast.NAME: Lightning Blast
${ModID}:LightningBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Discard !M! cards next turn.

${ModID}:ShiningSigil.NAME: Shining Sigil
${ModID}:ShiningSigil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block per debuff on ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Stoneskin.NAME: Stoneskin
${ModID}:Stoneskin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you would take damage this turn, take !M! less.

${ModID}:BoltFromTheBlue.NAME: Bolt From the Blue
${ModID}:BoltFromTheBlue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only target an enemy with at least !M! debuffs.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Enemy does not have enough debuffs.

${ModID}:Shapeshift.NAME: Shapeshift
${ModID}:Shapeshift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. NL Upon pickup, gain *Injury.
${ModID}:Shapeshift.FLAVOR: Well of course it hurts. You rearranged your entire body including the organs. This was an entirely foreseeable consequence.

${ModID}:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
${ModID}:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This deals 1 damage for every !M! health the target is missing.
${ModID}:Collapse.FLAVOR: Force spells were viewed in a better light before people saw the gruesome results of this one.

${ModID}:Acoustics.NAME: Acoustics
${ModID}:Acoustics.DESCRIPTION: Resonant cards now target ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ConstantPractice.NAME: Constant Practice
${ModID}:ConstantPractice.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards in your discard pile and return them to your hand. They cost 1 less this combat.

${ModID}:Focused.NAME: Focused
${ModID}:Focused.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Activate: Once per turn you can put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:GolemForm.NAME: Golem Form
${ModID}:GolemForm.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! less damage from attacks. NL ${ModID}:Activate: Once per turn you may spend [E] to deal !${ModID}:M2! damage to a random enemy.
${ModID}:GolemForm.FLAVOR: My most important work.  Immunity to disease and old age.  Strength, durability.  Unfortunately I was exiled before I could transcend the human form.

${ModID}:SadisticGlee.NAME: Sadistic Glee
${ModID}:SadisticGlee.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy.
${ModID}:SadisticGlee.FLAVOR: Sometimes I get carried away in battle. And laugh a bit more than I should. But I'm not insane.

${ModID}:ElegantEtching.NAME: Elegant Etching
${ModID}:ElegantEtching.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a ${ModID}:Sigil is played, apply !M! ${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Madness.NAME: Madness
${ModID}:Madness.FLAVOR: In exchange for letting her observe my conclave, a Watcher taught us how to channel our rage. I decided to instead channel other people's rage.

${ModID}:SummonMonster.NAME: Summon Monsters
${ModID}:SummonMonster.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Channel a !M! damage Panda. NL Pandas deal damage at the start of your turn.
${ModID}:SummonMonster.FLAVOR: I always thought summoning spells were weak. Then I managed to develop a version that kept summoning.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! additional cards and discard !M! cards.
${ModID}:Prepare.FLAVOR: Do this ahead of time. NOT during battle.

${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.NAME: Malicious Dagger
${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Curse in your deck.
${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.FLAVOR: I don't just inflict curses. I know how to channel the negative energies if I am the victim.

${ModID}:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
${ModID}:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Soulbound. NL When drawn, ALL enemies gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:BadLuck.NAME: Bad Luck
${ModID}:BadLuck.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Soulbound. NL When drawn, discard the highest cost card in your hand.

${ModID}:Whispers.NAME: Whispers
${ModID}:Whispers.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this is in your hand at the end of this turn, draw !M! less card next turn.

${ModID}:NullElement.NAME: Null Element
${ModID}:NullElement.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Soulbound. NL Ethereal. NL When drawn, lose [E].
